channel.title: How To Make A Website | The Right Way
channel.description:
[b]Intro: [/b]Yo errrbody. This is a video on how to make a simple home ran website. This will hopefully make some nicer looking websites/forums out there and eliminate webs.com
[center][size=14pt]Contents[/size][/center]
[size=12pt]Step 1[/size]
[b]1: [/b]Download Xampp: [url=http://www.oldapps.com/xampp.php?app=9a0974516975432788c3c853ae31e518]HERE[/url]
[b]2: [/b]Install like so... [b]A: [/b][IMG]http://i373.photobucket.com/albums/oo176/Ranger_Owns/Capture.png[/img] [b]B: [/b][IMG]http://i373.photobucket.com/albums/oo176/Ranger_Owns/Capture2-1.png[/img] [b]C: [/b][IMG]http://i373.photobucket.com/albums/oo176/Ranger_Owns/Capture3.png[/img] [b]D: [/b][IMG]http://i373.photobucket.com/albums/oo176/Ranger_Owns/Capture4.png[/img]
[size=12pt]Step 2[/size]
[b]1: [/b]Set MySQL Password: [url=http://localhost/security/xamppsecurity.php]HERE[/url]
[b]2: [/b]Setup like so... [b]A: [/b][IMG]http://i373.photobucket.com/albums/oo176/Ranger_Owns/Capture6.png[/img]
[b][i]Here we will set up the password for MySQL. For some odd reason, this page likes to be German, regardless of what language you installed in. If not, lucky you, below is a translation.
Akuelles Passwort: (current password) Neues Passwort: (new password) Wiederhole neues Passwort: (confirm new password) The current password is "" After filling that out click "Passwort andern" (change password)[/i][/b]
[b][size=14pt]I recommend using google chrome here. It will translate for yo bitch ass.[/size][/b] Download Google Chrome [url=http://www.google.com/chrome]HERE![/url]
Xampp installation Pictures/Translation all from deathchaos9 and his '317 Highscores' Tutorial.
[size=12pt]Step 3[/size]
[b]1: [/b]Download a website. [b]A: [/b]Runescape Classic Theme: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,392386.0.html]Click Here To Download[/url]
[IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/30k5y8o.png[/img]
[b]B: [/b]Runescape Theme (2010 I Think) [url=http://www.rune-server.org/programming/website-development/tutorials/263450-current-runescape-website-template.html]Click Here To Download[/url]
[IMG]http://i857.photobucket.com/albums/ab134/mastazak/screen.png[/img]
[b]2: [/b] :confused:Navigate to C:/Xampp/Htdocs/
[b]3: [/b]Delete all the shit in this folder replace with website (Runescape website or other html/css/etc template
[size=12pt]Tada! You've got your very own website! Keep open Xampp Control Panel! :D How to host your website with no-ip / get an awesome free forums included in video, however I CBA to write anymore here.[/size]
[i][size=14pt]Additional Links:[/size][/i][
[b]Awesome Free Forums: [/b] http://download.simplemachines.org/
[b]No-Ip: [/b] http://www.no-ip.com/downloads.php
That should wrap everything up. Post any comments, concerns, or errors as a reply.
[center][size=24pt][font=comic sans ms][u]Video Tutorial[/u][/font][/size]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=56Tnb-JjQ2g[/youtube][/center]
[b]Last Note: [/b]Yes IK i got an error when installing smf in vid however i promise my left testicle it will NOT happen to you. Its because of previous things I've done.
[center][b][size=12pt][u]Credits[/u][/size][/b][/center]
[ul][li][b]Me: [/b]Creating Tutorial[/li] [li][b]Deathchaos9: [/b]Xampp Shit[/li] [li][b]ProgramingForever: [/b]Classic RS Template[/li] [li][b]mastazak: [/b]Modern RS Templatel[/li][/ul]
A bit of legal action just to be safe....
By downloading this file you agree that I am not responsible for how the files are used, And punishment for using the files discussed in a court of law (If Any) shall not be backed up,
If a runescape representative comes across your website and sees that it is identical to the Official Runescape.com website possible legal action will be taken against you.
All images in file are Copyright

item.title: How To Make A Website | The Right Way
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

Intro: Yo errrbody. This is a video on how to make a simple home ran website. This will hopefully make some nicer looking websites/forums out there and eliminate webs.com

[center][size=14pt]Contents[/size][/center]

[size=12pt]Step 1[/size]

[b]1: [/b]Download Xampp: [url=http://www.oldapps.com/xampp.php?app=9a0974516975432788c3c853ae31e518]HERE[/url]

    [b]2: [/b]Install like so...
     [b]A: [/b][IMG]http://i373.photobucket.com/albums/oo176/Ranger_Owns/Capture.png[/img]
      [b]B: [/b][IMG]http://i373.photobucket.com/albums/oo176/Ranger_Owns/Capture2-1.png[/img]
       [b]C: [/b][IMG]http://i373.photobucket.com/albums/oo176/Ranger_Owns/Capture3.png[/img]
        [b]D: [/b][IMG]http://i373.photobucket.com/albums/oo176/Ranger_Owns/Capture4.png[/img]

[size=12pt]Step 2[/size]

[b]1: [/b]Set MySQL Password: [url=http://localhost/security/xamppsecurity.php]HERE[/url]

    [b]2: [/b]Setup like so...
     [b]A: [/b][IMG]http://i373.photobucket.com/albums/oo176/Ranger_Owns/Capture6.png[/img]

[b][i]Here we will set up the password for MySQL.
For some odd reason, this page likes to be German, regardless of what language you installed in. If not, lucky you, below is a translation.

Akuelles Passwort: (current password)
Neues Passwort: (new password)
Wiederhole neues Passwort: (confirm new password)
The current password is “”
After filling that out click “Passwort andern” (change password)[/i][/b]

[size=14pt]I recommend using google chrome here. It will translate for yo bitch ass.[/size]
Download Google Chrome HERE!

Xampp installation Pictures/Translation all from deathchaos9 and his ‘317 Highscores’ Tutorial.

[size=12pt]Step 3[/size]

[b]1: [/b]Download a website.
 [b]A: [/b]Runescape Classic Theme: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,392386.0.html]Click Here To Download[/url]

30k5y8o.png983×669 

  [b]B: [/b]Runescape Theme (2010 I Think) [url=http://www.rune-server.org/programming/website-development/tutorials/263450-current-runescape-website-template.html]Click Here To Download[/url]

screen.png1023×578 

    [b]2: [/b] :confused:Navigate to C:/Xampp/Htdocs/

        [b]3: [/b]Delete all the shit in this folder replace with website (Runescape website or other html/css/etc template

[size=12pt]Tada! You’ve got your very own website! Keep open Xampp Control Panel! How to host your website with no-ip / get an awesome free forums included in video, however I CBA to write anymore here.[/size]

[size=14pt]Additional Links:[/size][

Awesome Free Forums: http://download.simplemachines.org/

No-Ip: http://www.no-ip.com/downloads.php

That should wrap everything up.
Post any comments, concerns, or errors as a reply.

[center][size=24pt][font=comic sans ms]Video Tutorial[/font][/size]

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=56Tnb-JjQ2g[/youtube][/center]

Last Note: Yes IK i got an error when installing smf in vid however i promise my left testicle it will NOT happen to you. Its because of previous things I’ve done.

[center][size=12pt]Credits[/size][/center]

[ul][li]Me: Creating Tutorial[/li]
[li]Deathchaos9: Xampp Shit[/li]
[li]ProgramingForever: Classic RS Template[/li]
[li]mastazak: Modern RS Templatel[/li][/ul]

A bit of legal action just to be safe…

By downloading this file you agree that I am not responsible for how the files are used,
And punishment for using the files discussed in a court of law (If Any) shall not
be backed up,

If a runescape representative comes across your website and sees that it is identical to the Official Runescape.com website possible legal action will be taken against you.

All images in file are Copyright
